lyrics.text:
Na’e ha’u mo Sīsū
‘A e lotu lelei
Pea ‘oku kau totonu
Ki he laumālie.

Ko e toki lotu
‘Oku ‘aonga lahi,
Ki he kakai angahia
Ke nau mo’ui ai.

‘Oku ne fakahā
Ki he angahala,
‘A e tokonaki ‘ofa
‘A hotau ‘Otua.

Na’a ne foaki
‘A Sīsū totonu
Ko e hifo mahu’inga
‘I he’etau hia.

Ko e unga’anga
Ki he halaia
Pea ‘ata’atāina
Pea faingofua.

Lotu kia Sīsū
Pea ‘amanaki
Ki he fakamolemole
Pea mo e liliu.
